description: Little Pete’s has hit the streets of Naples and is serving all the hungry peeps with the most delicious and authentic Napolitana eats. Chef Peter’s great-grandmother founded the original Pete’s in Brooklyn's Navy Yard District back in 1894, and now he’s keeping those traditions and flavors alive as he tours through town and cooks up the best Italian food around. Little Pete’s menu packs big flavor with their selection of Parmesan-style Chicken, Eggplant, Sausage, and more. You can also find a fine assortment of savory sides, like the Meatballs or Sweet Potato Basil Fries. If you’re lookin’ for the best little bite of Brooklyn, Little Pete’s can't be beat.
name: Little Pete's
